description:
While trying to deal with the stress at work, Onodera gets an unexpected phone call and visit that causes a riff between him and Takano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Follow Love and It Will Flee Thee, Flee Love and It Will Follow Thee.
Follow Love and It Will Flee Thee, Flee Love and It Will Follow Thee.
Follow love and it will flee thee,flee love and it will follow thee.
